name: undkonsorten/typo3-cute-mailing
description: A TYPO3 extension that makes mailing and newsletter sending cute. Send TYPO3 pages as emails to many recipients.

suggest.undkonsorten/typo3-cute-mailing-register: Connector for recipient list if register/unregister subscriber with registeraddress extension.
suggest.undkonsorten/typo3-cute-mailing-ttaddres: tt_address recipient connector. If just tt_address data should be used in recipient list.
